testcase.name: User successfully signs in to their account
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the magento homepage...................................passed When the user clicks on the "Sign In" button................................passed And the user enters valid login credentials.................................passed And the user submits the login form.........................................passed

testcase.name: User successfully signs up for an account
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the homepage...........................................passed When the user clicks on the "Create an Account" button......................passed Then the user should be redirected to the sign-up page......................passed And the page should display "Create New Customer Account"...................passed When the user enters valid sign-up details..................................passed And the user submits the sign-up form.......................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the My Account dashboard..............passed
